## About Me

I’m Harshil Kurapati, a rising senior in high school with a passion for data science. You can find more about my work on [GitHub](https://github.com/hkurapat) or reach out to me via email at [ckurapat@gmail.com](mailto:ckurapat@gmail.com).

## About This Project

This project explores the impact of race and gender on income using a Bayesian Regression Model. You can view the project's code and documentation on its [GitHub repository](https://github.com/hkurapat/income-prediction).

## Acknowledgements

This project was created as part of [Kane’s Data Science Bootcamp](https://bootcamp.davidkane.info/), where I have been developing essential skills in data analysis and visualization.
